title: Synthesis of β-enamino malonates through caesium carbonate-promoted reaction of nitro-substituted donor–acceptor cyclopropanes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33587-33591
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05619A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sebastin Raj Jeny, Subramani Selvi, Murugaiya Deerkadharshini, Kannupal Srinivasan
A caesium carbonate-promoted reaction of nitro-substituted donor–acceptor cyclopropanes (DACs) with primary aromatic amines in water provides convenient access to β-enamino malonates under mild reaction conditions.
